1. City Council

City Council
============

City Council members are elected to four year staggered terms. Council meetings are held on the third Tuesday of every month at 6 pm. The City Council may meet more frequently as Special Meetings are subject to call by the Mayor.

City Council Members
--------------------

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Mayor, Councilmember Place 5 | Mary Speidel |
| Mayor Pro Tem, Councilmember Place 3 | Greg Ybarra |
| Councilmember Place 2 | Nathan Lindeman |
| Councilmember Place 1 | Edward Adams |
| Councilmember Place 4 | Lulu Lopez |
